sentences.sentence: He is often the victim of vituperative remarks concerning his wealth.
sentences.translation: 他经常因为他的财富而遭受辱骂。

sentences.sentence: Internet chatrooms are full of vituperative anti-foreign sentiment.
sentences.translation: 互联网聊天室里充斥着谩骂式的反外情绪。

sentences.sentence: When I watched the vituperative Mr. Hyde, I was sure there must be a Dr. Jekyll in there somewhere, but I was having a hard time finding him.
sentences.translation: 当我注视着满口责骂的海德先生时，我确信他身上有杰基尔博士的那一面，但我在当时很难发现它。
